item.title: Dog park party pooper
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I peed in the communal water bowl at the dog park. Then I watched as other dogs drank out of it. I am a cute little jerk. Love, Spencer. Age 10
item.content:encoded:
I peed in the communal water bowl at the dog park. Then I watched as other dogs drank out of it. I am a cute little jerk.

Love, Spencer. Age 10

item.title: Laundry Raider
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: “I like to wear my mom’s bra! I am ashamed!” Tuffy is a notorious laundry raider. Bras and panties are her favourite things to try on. She usually comes slinking to her mom for help when she gets all tangled up in them.
item.content:encoded:
“I like to wear my mom’s bra! I am ashamed!”

Tuffy is a notorious laundry raider. Bras and panties are her favourite things to try on. She usually comes slinking to her mom for help when she gets all tangled up in them.

item.title: She didn’t think we’d notice…
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Just realized that Fiona has been using the bottom rungs of the antique dining room set as a chew toy. Her daddy has been out all day trying to make repairs. Looks like an expensive chew toy!
item.content:encoded: Just realized that Fiona has been using the bottom rungs of the antique dining room set as a chew toy. Her daddy has been out all day trying to make repairs. Looks like an expensive chew toy!

item.title: I Let This Kitty Bully Me
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I really want to go all the way upstairs but this mean kitty won’t let me. Kitty is a Bully!
item.content:encoded: I really want to go all the way upstairs but this mean kitty won’t let me. Kitty is a Bully!

item.title: Welcome to the new Dog Shaming!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description:
As you might have noticed, our website looks a little different today. We've decided to revamp the website in order to speed up the loading process for you! Our website has undergone tremendous change from the inside as well as the outside. Our content has not and will not change. Over the next few days, there may be a few glitches and such. If you happen upon any glitches, feel free to email us a screen cap!
Woof,
Dog Shaming
item.content:encoded:
As you might have noticed, our website looks a little different today. We’ve decided to revamp the website in order to speed up the loading process for you! Our website has undergone tremendous change from the inside as well as the outside. Our content has not and will not change. Over the next few days, there may be a few glitches and such. If you happen upon any glitches, feel free to email us a screen cap!

 

Woof,

Dog Shaming

item.title: Giacomo: Life of the Party
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: This is my Great Dane Giacomo. Last night we had a party for my sister’s birthday and he was partying pretty hard. He’s usually the first one up every morning. This morning was an exception.
item.content:encoded: This is my Great Dane Giacomo. Last night we had a party for my sister’s birthday and he was partying pretty hard. He’s usually the first one up every morning. This morning was an exception.

item.title: The Car Wash
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: The car wash makes me angry!!!
item.content:encoded: The car wash makes me angry!!!

item.title: I stole and buried the baby’s bottle
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Ruckus not only stole his human baby Gigi’s bottle, he buried it and then unburied it months later…we wondered why the bottles seemed to be disappearing…mystery solved..oh Ruckus..why you? Why is it always you?
item.content:encoded: Ruckus not only stole his human baby Gigi’s bottle, he buried it and then unburied it months later…we wondered why the bottles seemed to be disappearing…mystery solved..oh Ruckus..why you? Why is it always you?

item.title: Snowman Killer
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: We built a snowman. She had a carrot for a nose. Daisy likes likes carrots. Snowmen, not so much.
item.content:encoded: We built a snowman. She had a carrot for a nose. Daisy likes likes carrots. Snowmen, not so much.

item.title: High Fiber Diet
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I needed more fiber in my diet, I’m not sorry…..Love Zoe
item.content:encoded: I needed more fiber in my diet, I’m not sorry…..Love Zoe
